titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2023 as "National Sarcoma Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2023 as "National Sarcoma Awareness Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Sarcoma Awareness Month. Sarcoma is a cancer of connective tissues, such as nerves, muscles, joints, fat, bones, and blood vessels.
